subject: Re: [junit] assertTrue in setUp() methode
msgSnippet: In my opinion, no. The purpose of setup and tear down is to setup and teardown anything needed for each test. I have done a testCreate test casew before that
messageBody:
In my opinion, no. The purpose of setup and tear down is to setup and
teardown anything needed for each test.

I have done a testCreate test casew before that tested creation of an object
... is this what want?

Thanks,
James


On 9/18/06, isowitz <isowitz@...> wrote:
>
> I have a short question. Is it good to make a assertTrue(), assertEquals
> () etc. in the setUp() or tearDown() methode?
>
>
>
